summary: The complete set of armor the Dovahkiin wears in the trailers, in HD !! It includes Studded armor, Iron gauntlets, Iron boots, and Iron helmet.
descriptionHtml:
Hi all,

I think there is only one serious HD retexture here on the nexus for the studded armor (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1322), and one for the iron armor parts the Dovahkiin wears... Even though those two mods are wonderful, they were simply not to my taste. 

So I decided a few days ago I would learn what a DDS is, what a normal map does, etc. And here is what I did !! So I am more than a noob to texture editing... I nevertheless managed to create from scratch all the iron parts. 

IMPORTANT NOTICE: For the studded armor, all the credits go to Bernabn. But his mod does not include the shoulder plate engraving that is so cool to me. It has just a flat grey texture as you can see in the picture. So I did change that. It took me a few hours to achieve what I wanted...

This way you have the complete armor set you need to look like The dovaahkiin, in HD !!

I hope you will enjoy and all comments and suggestions (and maybe endorsments) are welcome :-)

Installation: as usual, just extract to your skyrim folder.

EDIT: I realized that the size of the images I uploaded don\'t do justice at all, please give it a try and see them in-game!
author: zezzz
